source: TEXT_LUCKMB105_03306_SEQ_00<tab>Thancred is trying to think his way out of the present predicament.
target: TEXT_LUCKMB105_03306_SEQ_00<tab>イル・メグのサンクレッドは、思案しているようだ。

source: TEXT_LUCKMB105_03306_SEQ_01<tab>From what little he is able to make of the mischievous voices, Thancred believes that the pixies wish to play with you. He reasons that they may therefore allow you to find their village, Lydha Lran─if nowhere else. At his suggestion, the party continues along the path.
target: TEXT_LUCKMB105_03306_SEQ_01<tab>サンクレッドから、ピクシー族の集落になら到達できるかもしれないと言われた。イル・メグのリダ・ラーンにいる「サンクレッド」と話そう。

source: TEXT_LUCKMB105_03306_SEQ_02<tab>You soon arrive at the pixie settlement, but see no sign of its residents. Convinced this means their games have already begun, Thancred suggests that you search for a plant with a furled tip called a looking grass which should allow you to see them. Before you set about your task, you are warned not to respond to any voices that call to you, lest you fall prey to further mischief.
target: TEXT_LUCKMB105_03306_SEQ_02<tab>サンクレッドと話した。リダ・ラーンの「<var 28 ((EObj)) F61EAAD801 /var>」から「<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8E6501 /var>」を入手しよう。

source: TEXT_LUCKMB105_03306_SEQ_03<tab>You succeed in finding the looking grass, but not wholly unscathed. You hurry back to Thancred that he might put an end to the pixies' games.
target: TEXT_LUCKMB105_03306_SEQ_03<tab><var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8E6501 /var>を入手した。リダ・ラーンの「サンクレッド」に「<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8E6501 /var>を渡そう。

source: TEXT_LUCKMB105_03306_SEQ_04<tab>Thancred puts the looking grass to use, and moments later the pixies pop into being all around you. Unfortunately, they prove disinclined to let you continue on your way, and after a moment's discussion declare that you must lend them a helping hand. Heaving a heavy sigh, Thancred suggests splitting up to tend to the pixies' chores.
target: TEXT_LUCKMB105_03306_SEQ_04<tab>サンクレッドによって、ピクシー族の姿が暴かれた。ウリエンジェと一刻も早く合流するためにも、ピクシー族に手を貸していこう。

source: TEXT_LUCKMB105_03306_TODO_02<tab>Deliver the looking grass to Thancred.
target: TEXT_LUCKMB105_03306_TODO_02<tab>サンクレッドに<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8E6501 /var>を渡す

TEXT_LUCKMB105_03306_ALPHINAUD_000_000<tab>幽霊ではなく、妖精の仕業なのか。
…………………ほっ。

source: TEXT_LUCKMB105_03306_ALISAIE_000_005<tab>I was worried about the others back in Lakeland, but maybe I should be worried about us.
target:
TEXT_LUCKMB105_03306_ALISAIE_000_005<tab>レイクランドに残ったライナの方を心配してたけど、
こっちも一筋縄じゃいかなさそうね……！

source: TEXT_LUCKMB105_03306_RYNE_000_010<tab>I'm trying my best to remember...but it feels like peering through fog.
target:
TEXT_LUCKMB105_03306_RYNE_000_010<tab>ご、ごめんなさい……。
頭の中に、そこだけ霧がかかったみたいで……。

source: TEXT_LUCKMB105_03306_THANCRED_000_020<tab>As it stands, we cannot hope to find the way to Urianger. For that, we must convince the pixies to lift the spell.
target:
TEXT_LUCKMB105_03306_THANCRED_000_020<tab>ふむ……。
こういうときは、無暗に歩き回るより、
ピクシー族にイタズラをやめさせた方が確実だろうな。

source: TEXT_LUCKMB105_03306_THANCRED_000_021<tab>From what I could make of the voices, the creatures want to play with us. If that is the case, they <var 1A 02 /var>should<var 1A 01 /var> permit us to find their village─Lydha Lran.
target:
TEXT_LUCKMB105_03306_THANCRED_000_021<tab>さっきのささやき声からすると、
連中は俺たちを遊びに招き入れたいらしい。
ということは、ピクシー族の集落へは辿り着けるかもしれない。

source: TEXT_LUCKMB105_03306_THANCRED_000_022<tab>Come. I have a sneaking suspicion this path will lead us directly into their midst.
target:
TEXT_LUCKMB105_03306_THANCRED_000_022<tab>ひとまず、まっすぐ進んでみよう。
あちらにその気があるのなら、連中の集落……
「リダ・ラーン」に着くはずだ。

source: TEXT_LUCKMB105_03306_THANCRED_000_023<tab>Oh, and I should mention that Minfilia has been informed of our situation. Of the different worlds and our mission. You may consider her an ally.
target:
TEXT_LUCKMB105_03306_THANCRED_000_023<tab>……それから、ミンフィリアについては、
原初世界のことも含めて、こちらの事情を伝えてある。
その点については心配せずに、同行させてやってくれ。

source: TEXT_LUCKMB105_03306_ALPHINAUD_000_030<tab>The sense of disorientation is quite overwhelming. I cannot take a dozen steps without forgetting whence we came.
target:
TEXT_LUCKMB105_03306_ALPHINAUD_000_030<tab>本当に、おかしな感覚だ。
私たちは、どちらの方向から来たのだろうか……？

source: TEXT_LUCKMB105_03306_ALISAIE_000_035<tab>There's not a soul in sight, yet I feel eyes all over us...
target:
TEXT_LUCKMB105_03306_ALISAIE_000_035<tab>いくらか家があるようだけど、人は住んでいないみたいね。
それにしては、視線を感じる気がするわ……。

source: TEXT_LUCKMB105_03306_RYNE_000_040<tab>Hmm... There was a plant which might help us...if only I could remember what it looked like...
target: TEXT_LUCKMB105_03306_RYNE_000_040<tab>えっと……こういうときは、たしか……。

source: TEXT_LUCKMB105_03306_THANCRED_000_050<tab>Well, here we are. Yet the pixies are nowhere to be seen. Knowing them, their games have already begun. In which case...
target:
TEXT_LUCKMB105_03306_THANCRED_000_050<tab>やはり、リダ・ラーンには辿り着けたな。
だが、交渉しようにもピクシー族の姿はなしか……。

source: TEXT_LUCKMB105_03306_THANCRED_000_051<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>─there is a variety of plant native to these parts with a distinctive furled tip.
target:
TEXT_LUCKMB105_03306_THANCRED_000_051<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>、悪いがお前も、
先が渦のように丸まった草を探してくれないか？

source: TEXT_LUCKMB105_03306_THANCRED_000_052<tab>"Looking grass“ is its name─so called because it can be used to spy pixies, believe it or not. I'll...explain how I know all of this later, but first, I need you to help me find some.
target:
TEXT_LUCKMB105_03306_THANCRED_000_052<tab>そいつは「透鏡草（とうきょうそう）」といって、
ピクシー族を見つけるのに必要なものなんだ。
必ずこの集落のそばに生えているから、注意深く見てみてくれ。

source: TEXT_LUCKMB105_03306_THANCRED_000_053<tab>Oh─if a voice calls to you, under no circumstances should you respond. You will only subject yourself to further mischief.
target:
TEXT_LUCKMB105_03306_THANCRED_000_053<tab>それから、途中でどこからともなく声をかけられても、
決して返事はしないこと。
あいつらの術に、ますます引き込まれちまうからな。

source: TEXT_LUCKMB105_03306_THANCRED_000_060<tab>Remember, the plant has a furled tip. And I cannot stress this enough, but do not respond to any voices you hear.
target:
TEXT_LUCKMB105_03306_THANCRED_000_060<tab>先が渦のように丸まった草を探してくれ。
途中で声をかけられても、決して返事はするなよ。

source: TEXT_LUCKMB105_03306_SYSTEM_000_070<tab>You search the scrub, but find nothing resembling looking grass. Suddenly, a voice rings out...
target:
TEXT_LUCKMB105_03306_SYSTEM_000_070<tab>「<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8E6501 /var>」らしき草はないようだ。
どこからともなく、声が聞こえてくる……。

source: TEXT_LUCKMB105_03306_PIXIEVOICEA03306_000_071<tab>(-Adorable Voice-)Hee hee hee... Greetings, mortal! What is your name?
target:
TEXT_LUCKMB105_03306_PIXIEVOICEA03306_000_071<tab>(-愛らしい子どもの声-)うふふふ……。
ねえねえ、アナタお名前はなんて言うの？

source: TEXT_LUCKMB105_03306_PIXIEVOICEA03306_000_072<tab>(-Adorable Voice-)<var 29 EB02 /var>, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 03 /var> <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! A wonderful name! Pretty like morning dew and funny like caterpillars!
target:
TEXT_LUCKMB105_03306_PIXIEVOICEA03306_000_072<tab>(-愛らしい子どもの声-)<var 29 EB02 /var>！
朝露みたいにかわいくて、芋虫みたいにおかしな名前！

source: TEXT_LUCKMB105_03306_PIXIEVOICEA03306_000_073<tab>(-Adorable Voice-)I shall slice it and splice it and make it mine! <var 1A 02 /var>All<var 1A 01 /var> mine! And when your name is mine, so are <var 1A 02 /var>you<var 1A 01 /var>! Hee hee hee...
target:
TEXT_LUCKMB105_03306_PIXIEVOICEA03306_000_073<tab>(-愛らしい子どもの声-)刻んで千切って縫いつけて、ワタシの言葉に変えましょう。
ワタシの言葉になったなら、アナタはすっかりワタシのものよ。
うふふふふ……。

source: TEXT_LUCKMB105_03306_PIXIEVOICEA03306_000_075<tab>(-Adorable Voice-)Oh, you don't have a name? How very, very sad. I could have had sooo much fun with it, hee hee hee...
target:
TEXT_LUCKMB105_03306_PIXIEVOICEA03306_000_075<tab>(-愛らしい子どもの声-)あら、答えてくれないの？
ざぁんねん……うふふふ…………。

source: TEXT_LUCKMB105_03306_PIXIEVOICEB03306_000_076<tab>(-Kindly Voice-)What is it that you seek, child? Perhaps I can help you find it.
target:
TEXT_LUCKMB105_03306_PIXIEVOICEB03306_000_076<tab>(-ささやくような声-)くすくすくす……何か探し物かしら。
お手伝いしましょうか？

source: TEXT_LUCKMB105_03306_PIXIEVOICEB03306_000_077<tab>(-Kindly Voice-)Ah yes, I know the plant. And being the kindly pixie that I am, I shall take you to it.
target:
TEXT_LUCKMB105_03306_PIXIEVOICEB03306_000_077<tab>(-ささやくような声-)もちろん、もちろん、知ってるわ。
私は優しい妖精だから、あなたに教えてあげましょう。

source: TEXT_LUCKMB105_03306_PIXIEVOICEB03306_000_078<tab>(-Kindly Voice-)Just close your eyes and focus on my voice. Set your mind adrift, and together we shall go to the ends of the realm.
target:
TEXT_LUCKMB105_03306_PIXIEVOICEB03306_000_078<tab>(-ささやくような声-)さあ、眠るように目を閉じて……。
私の声だけ、よく聞いて……？
この花園の奥深くまで、私と一緒に行きましょう……？

source: TEXT_LUCKMB105_03306_PIXIEVOICEB03306_000_079<tab>Hmph, such a rude child, and too clever by half! I shall seek my fun elsewhere!
target:
TEXT_LUCKMB105_03306_PIXIEVOICEB03306_000_079<tab>あら、失礼で賢いヒト！
おもしろくないわねぇ……。

source: TEXT_LUCKMB105_03306_SYSTEM_000_079<tab>Searching the scrub, you find what appears to be looking grass. Suddenly, a voice rings out...
target:
TEXT_LUCKMB105_03306_SYSTEM_000_079<tab>「<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8E6501 /var>」らしき草を見つけた！
どこからともなく、声が聞こえてくる……。

source: TEXT_LUCKMB105_03306_PIXIEVOICEC03306_000_080<tab>(-Playful Voice-)Ooh, a visitor! Where are you from, pray tell?
target:
TEXT_LUCKMB105_03306_PIXIEVOICEC03306_000_080<tab>(-楽しそうな子どもの声-)ねえねえ、教えて！
君、どこから来たのかな？

source: TEXT_LUCKMB105_03306_PIXIEVOICEC03306_000_081<tab>(-Playful Voice-)What is that? Where is that? When is that? In your dreams, perhaps?
target:
TEXT_LUCKMB105_03306_PIXIEVOICEC03306_000_081<tab>(-楽しそうな子どもの声-)はてはて、さてさて、クリスタリウム……。
それはいったい、どこのこと？　夢の中の都かな？

source: TEXT_LUCKMB105_03306_PIXIEVOICEC03306_000_082<tab>(-Playful Voice-)Forget all about that place, for Il Mheg is your home now. Today and tomorrow and forevermore...
target:
TEXT_LUCKMB105_03306_PIXIEVOICEC03306_000_082<tab>(-楽しそうな子どもの声-)君はずーっと、ここイル・メグの住民さ！
今日も、明日も、永遠に……。

source: TEXT_LUCKMB105_03306_PIXIEVOICEC03306_000_083<tab>(-Playful Voice-)Hmmm... Perhaps this one's hard of hearing... AHEM! WHAT BRINGS YOU HERE!?
target:
TEXT_LUCKMB105_03306_PIXIEVOICEC03306_000_083<tab>(-楽しそうな子どもの声-)あれれ、聞こえなかったのかな？
ねえってば、君はどうしてここにいるの？
TEXT_LUCKMB105_03306_A4_000_001<tab>ウリエンジェに会うためだ

source: TEXT_LUCKMB105_03306_PIXIEVOICEC03306_000_084<tab>(-Playful Voice-)Ah, so you <var 1A 02 /var>can<var 1A 01 /var> hear me! Good, good!
target:
TEXT_LUCKMB105_03306_PIXIEVOICEC03306_000_084<tab>(-楽しそうな子どもの声-)なんだ、聞こえてるんじゃない！
だったらもーっと、お話しよう……？

source: TEXT_LUCKMB105_03306_PIXIEVOICEC03306_000_085<tab>(-Playful Voice-)Come, let's chitter-chatter, jibber-jabber, bibble-babble! Today and tomorrow and forevermore...
target:
TEXT_LUCKMB105_03306_PIXIEVOICEC03306_000_085<tab>(-楽しそうな子どもの声-)ぺちゃくちゃ、べらべら、だらだらと。
ほかのことは忘れてさ。
今日も、明日も、永遠に……。

TEXT_LUCKMB105_03306_PIXIEVOICEC03306_000_086<tab>(-楽しそうな子どもの声-)うーん、やっぱり聞こえてないのかな？
ちぇっ……つまらないの！

source: TEXT_LUCKMB105_03306_PIXIEVOICEC03306_000_087<tab>(-Playful Voice-)Still...picking plants at our village is as good as indulging in our hospitality. And who are we to turn you away? Hee hee, stay awhile...stay <var 1A 02 /var>forever<var 1A 01 /var>!
target:
TEXT_LUCKMB105_03306_PIXIEVOICEC03306_000_087<tab>(-楽しそうな子どもの声-)だけど、僕らの郷に生えてる草を採ったからには、
もう「踏み込んだ」ってことでいいよね……？
ふふ……ずっと一緒にいようね……。

source: TEXT_LUCKMB105_03306_THANCRED_000_089<tab>I take it you met with some trouble. Apologies for subjecting you to that.
target: TEXT_LUCKMB105_03306_THANCRED_000_089<tab>……悪い、災難に遭わせちまったみたいだな。

source: TEXT_LUCKMB105_03306_THANCRED_000_090<tab>Can I assume from your presence that you managed to find us some looking grass?
target:
TEXT_LUCKMB105_03306_THANCRED_000_090<tab>だが、戻って来たということは……
「<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8E6501 /var>」が見つかったのか？

source: TEXT_LUCKMB105_03306_THANCRED_000_091<tab>Yes, this is the stuff. Thus armed, we should be able to see through the pixies' veil of invisibility. And seeing them is the first step to dealing with them.
target:
TEXT_LUCKMB105_03306_THANCRED_000_091<tab>ああ、間違いない……！
これで妖精たちの姿を暴けば、
少しは対等な交渉に持ち込めるはずだ。

source: TEXT_LUCKMB105_03306_THANCRED_000_092<tab>Come, let's gather everyone and put Urianger's little trick to good use.
target:
TEXT_LUCKMB105_03306_THANCRED_000_092<tab>さっそく、みんなも集めてやってみるとしよう。
ウリエンジェ大先生直伝の方法だ。
